Package controller

Class LoginViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginViewController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the login functionality and user interface for the application. It allows users to log in, verifies their credentials, and logs login attempts.

  • Method Details

    • setUserTimeZone

      public void setUserTimeZone()
      Displays the user's time zone in the user interface. The time zone is determined by the system's default time zone.

    • OnActionLogin

      public void OnActionLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      Handles the "Login" action when the user attempts to log in.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the login button.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during user retrieval.
      IOException - If an error occurs during navigation.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller and sets up the initial state of the user interface.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object.
